title: Large-Scale Enhancement of Language Education Instructional Design Competency Through Teacher-Generative AI Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories, understanding of language education methodologies, and basic grammar and vocabulary analysis skills
context.additional_context: A practical course on instructional design for language education using generative AI in smartphone-based microlearning environments, enhancing teachers' competencies in expression design and reading comprehension guidance.

learning_goals: Learners can optimize text structure and vocabulary selection by revising a language education instructional design draft at least 3 times using generative AI tools.

Learners can present at least 2 strategies (e.g., grammar integration, expression diversification) for applying differences between expert bot and basic AI chatbot interactions to the language education instructional design process.
Learners can diagnose their level of initiative demonstrated in AI-supported language education design using a 3-tier self-assessment scale through project-based evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
